sentences.en: "We supply financial information to selected clients," Crook said loftily.
sentences.cn: “我们的金融信息服务对象是经过挑选的客户，”克鲁克傲慢地说道。

sentences.en: As the baby suckles, a further supply of milk is generated.
sentences.cn: 婴儿吮吸时，会有更多的奶水流出来。

sentences.en: by the law of supply and demand the cost of health care will plummet.
sentences.cn: 根据供求关系定律，保健费用将会骤降。

sentences.en: Don'tforget that all dogs need a supply of fresh water to drink.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记所有的狗都需要喝新鲜的水。

sentences.en: Food is in short supply all over the country.
sentences.cn: 全国普遍食品供应不足。

sentences.en: he meant to go, but time and petrol were in short supply.
sentences.cn: 他想要走，但时间和汽油都不够了。

sentences.en: Non-fat dairy products supply the needed nutrients without excessive calories.
sentences.cn: 脱脂乳制品能提供身体所需的营养，而不含过多的热量。

sentences.en: Nowadays that sort of innocence is in short supply.
sentences.cn: 现在那种天真烂漫很少见。

sentences.en: Paint for the project was supplied by the city.
sentences.cn: 该项目所用油漆由市政府提供。

sentences.en: Researchers need a growing supply of corpses for dissection.
sentences.cn: 研究人员需要更多的供解剖用的尸体。

sentences.en: Supply the missing word(s) and you could win a T-shirt.
sentences.cn: 填出所缺少的单词，你就会赢得一件T恤。

sentences.en: The Afghan air force was using helicopters to supply the besieged town.
sentences.cn: 阿富汗空军正用直升机向被围城镇提供补给。

sentences.en: The building had been trashed and its electricity supply cut.
sentences.cn: 那栋楼遭到打砸，电被切断。

sentences.en: The demand for places at some schools exceeds the supply.
sentences.cn: 某些学校的入学申请人数超过了招生。

sentences.en: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.cn: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.en: The supply of money in circulation was drastically reduced overnight.
sentences.cn: 流通领域的货币供应量一夜骤减。

sentences.en: There is a plentiful supply of arms on the black market.
sentences.cn: 黑市上有大量武器出售。

sentences.en: They believed that controlling the money supply would reduce inflation.
sentences.cn: 他们相信控制货币供应量会减少通货膨胀。

sentences.en: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.cn: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

sentences.en: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

words.tran_cn: 供应厂商，供应国；供应者

phrases.tran_cn: 能源供应；电源；供能供电
供电系统；建筑供配电系统
（商品，服务的）供应与需求，供求
供水系统；供应系统；包干制
开关电源；交换式电源供应

trans.tran_cn: 提供，供应（量），储备，补给品
trans.tran_en: an amount of something that is available to be used
an amount of something that is available to be used
to provide people with something that they need or want, especially regularly over a long period of time

trans.tran_cn: 供给， 供应； 满足， 弥补
trans.tran_en: to provide people with something that they need or want, especially regularly over a long period of time
